contest-event.event-date: Nov. 8, 1986 D National Mineworkers (Fourth Section) National Mineworkers (Fourth Section) 40 Test Piece Contest National Mineworkers Contest national-mineworkers-fourth-section This contest became the Butlins Mineworkers Contest in 2003. Fourth Test Piece Contest Blenheim (Heroic Overture) Winter Gardens (Opera House Foyer), Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK Prizes 1st £175, 2nd £150, 3rd £125, 4th £100, 5th £75, 6th £50. 18 bands competed 24th annual contest March 13, 2012, 9:06 p.m. July 17, 2016, 8:56 p.m. 1 Leicestershire Co-op (South Midlands Welfare) Colin Toghill 2 Old Silkstone John Hopkinson 3 Goldthorpe Band Duncan Beckley 4 Allerton Bywater Colliery Alan Morrison 5 Pleasley Colliery Welfare Band J.
